Name: 10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt
Description (Short): Very high critical hit ratio.
Description (Chinese Short): 戴着帽子的皮卡丘将通过Z力量增强的电击全力释放给对手，容易命中要害。

Name: Absorb
Description (Short): User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.
Description (Chinese Short): 吸取对手的养分进行攻击，可以回复给予对手伤害的一半ＨＰ。

Name: Accelerock
Description (Short): Usually goes first.
Description (Chinese Short): 迅速撞向对手进行攻击，必定能够先制攻击。

Name: Acid
Description (Short): 10% chance to lower the foe(s) Sp. Def by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 将强酸泼向对手进行攻击，10%几率令目标特防降低1级。

Name: Acid Armor
Description (Short): Raises the user's Defense by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过细胞的变化进行液化，从而大幅提高自己的防御，	令自己防御提升2级。

Name: Acid Downpour
Description (Short): Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量使毒沼涌起，全力让对手沉下去，威力会根据原来的招式而改变。

Name: Acid Spray
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 喷出能溶化对手的液体进行攻击，大幅降低对手的特防，	100%几率令目标特防降低2级。

Name: Acrobatics
Description (Short): Power doubles if the user has no held item.
Description (Chinese Short): 轻巧地攻击对手，自己没有携带道具时，威力翻倍。

Name: Acupressure
Description (Short): Raises a random stat of the user or an ally by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过点穴让身体舒筋活络，大幅提高某１项能力2级。

Name: Aerial Ace
Description (Short): This move does not check accuracy.
Description (Chinese Short): 以敏捷的动作戏弄对手后进行切斩，攻击必定会命中。

Name: Aeroblast
Description (Short): High critical hit ratio.
Description (Chinese Short): 发射空气旋涡进行攻击，容易击中要害，击中要害率比普通招式高1级。

Name: After You
Description (Short): The target makes its move right after the user.
Description (Chinese Short): 支援我方或对手的行动，使其紧接着此招式之后行动。

Name: Agility
Description (Short): Raises the user's Speed by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 让身体放松变得轻盈，以便高速移动，令自己速度提高2级。

Name: Air Cutter
Description (Short): High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.
Description (Chinese Short): 用锐利的风切斩对手进行攻击，容易击中要害，击中要害率比普通招式高1级。

Name: Air Slash
Description (Short): 30% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用连天空也能劈开的空气之刃进行攻击，有时会使对手畏缩，30%几率令目标畏缩。

Name: All-Out Pummeling
Description (Short): Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量制造出能量弹，全力撞向对手，威力会根据原来的招式而改变。

Name: Ally Switch
Description (Short): The user swaps positions with its ally.
Description (Chinese Short): 用神奇的力量瞬间移动，互换自己和同伴所在的位置。

Name: Amnesia
Description (Short): Raises the user's Sp. Def by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 将头脑清空，瞬间忘记某事，从而大幅提高自己的特防，令自己特防提高2级。

Name: Anchor Shot
Description (Short): Prevents the target from switching out.
Description (Chinese Short): 将锚缠住对手进行攻击，使对手无法逃走。

Name: Ancient Power
Description (Short): 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).
Description (Chinese Short): 用原始之力进行攻击，有时会提高自己所有的能力，10%几率令自己全部能力提升1级。

Name: Apple Acid
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 使用从酸苹果中提取出来的酸性液体进行攻击，降低对手特防，令对手特防降低1级。

Name: Aqua Jet
Description (Short): Usually goes first.
Description (Chinese Short): 以迅雷不及掩耳之势扑向对手，必定能够先制攻击。

Name: Aqua Ring
Description (Short): User recovers 1/16 max HP per turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 在自己身体的周围覆盖用水制造的幕，每回合回复ＨＰ。

Name: Aqua Tail
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 如惊涛骇浪般挥动大尾巴攻击对手。

Name: Arm Thrust
Description (Short): Hits 2-5 times in one turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 用张开着的双手猛推对手进行攻击，连续攻击２～５次。

Name: Aromatherapy
Description (Short): Cures the user's party of all status conditions.
Description (Chinese Short): 让同伴闻沁人心脾的香气，从而治愈我方全员的异常状态。

Name: Aromatic Mist
Description (Short): Raises an ally's Sp. Def by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过神奇的芳香，提高我方宝可梦的特防，令一位同伴的特防提升1级。

Name: Assist
Description (Short): Uses a random move known by a team member.
Description (Chinese Short): 向我方紧急求助，从我方宝可梦已学会的招式中随机使用１个。

Name: Assurance
Description (Short): Power doubles if target was damaged this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 如果此回合内对手已经受到伤害的话，招式威力会变成２倍。

Name: Astonish
Description (Short): 30% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用尖叫声等突然惊吓对手进行攻击，有时会使对手畏缩，30%几率令目标畏缩。

Name: Astral Barrage
Description (Short): No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.
Description (Chinese Short): 用大量的小灵体向对手发起攻击。

Name: Attack Order
Description (Short): High critical hit ratio.
Description (Chinese Short): 召唤手下，让其朝对手发起攻击，容易击中要害，击中要害率比普通招式高1级。

Name: Attract
Description (Short): A target of the opposite gender gets infatuated.
Description (Chinese Short): 诱惑对手，让对手着迷，对手将很难使出招式。

Name: Aura Sphere
Description (Short): This move does not check accuracy.
Description (Chinese Short): 从体内产生出波导之力，然后向对手发出，攻击必定会命中。

Name: Aura Wheel
Description (Short): Morpeko: Electric; Hangry: Dark; 100% +1 Spe.
Description (Chinese Short): 用储存在颊囊里的能量进行攻击，并提升自己的速度，其属性会随着莫鲁贝可的样子而改变。

Name: Aurora Beam
Description (Short): 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手发射虹色光束进行攻击，有时会降低对手的攻击，10%几率令目标攻击降低1级。

Name: Aurora Veil
Description (Short): For 5 turns, damage to allies is halved. Hail only.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内减弱物理和特殊的伤害，只有冰雹时才能使出。

Name: Autotomize
Description (Short): Raises the user's Speed by 2; user loses 100 kg.
Description (Chinese Short): 削掉身体上没用的部分。大幅提高自己的速度，同时体重也会变轻，令自己速度提升2级。

Name: Avalanche
Description (Short): Power doubles if user is damaged by the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 如果受到对手的招式攻击，就能给予该对手２倍威力的攻击。

Name: Baby-Doll Eyes
Description (Short): Lowers the target's Attack by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 用圆瞳凝视对手，从而降低其攻击。必定能够先制攻击，令目标攻击降低1级。

Name: Baddy Bad
Description (Short): Summons Reflect.
Description (Chinese Short): 恶行恶相地进行攻击，制造一道能减弱对手的反射壁。

Name: Baneful Bunker
Description (Short): Protects from moves. Contact: poison.
Description (Chinese Short): 防住对手攻击的同时，让接触到自己的对手中毒。

Name: Barrage
Description (Short): Hits 2-5 times in one turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手投掷圆形物体进行攻击，连续攻击２～５次。

Name: Barrier
Description (Short): Raises the user's Defense by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 制造坚固的壁障，从而大幅提高自己的防御，令自己防御提升2级。

Name: Baton Pass
Description (Short): User switches, passing stat changes and more.
Description (Chinese Short): 和后备宝可梦进行替换，换上的宝可梦能直接继承其能力的变化。

Name: Beak Blast
Description (Short): Burns on contact with the user before it moves.
Description (Chinese Short): 先加热鸟嘴后再进行攻击，鸟嘴在加热时对手触碰的话，就会使其灼伤。

Name: Beat Up
Description (Short): All healthy allies aid in damaging the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 我方全员进行攻击，同行的宝可梦越多，招式的攻击次数越多。

Name: Behemoth Bash
Description (Short): Damage doubles if the target is Dynamaxed.
Description (Chinese Short): 变身为巨大的盾，撞击对手，如果对手正处于极巨化状态，则造成的伤害会变成2倍。

Name: Behemoth Blade
Description (Short): Damage doubles if the target is Dynamaxed.
Description (Chinese Short): 变身为巨大的剑，挥斩对手，如果对手正处于极巨化状态，则造成的伤害会变成2倍。

Name: Belch
Description (Short): Cannot be selected until the user eats a Berry.
Description (Chinese Short): 朝着对手打嗝，并给予伤害，如果不吃树果则无法使出。

Name: Belly Drum
Description (Short): User loses 50% max HP. Maximizes Attack.
Description (Chinese Short): 将自己的ＨＰ减少到最大ＨＰ的一半，从而最大限度提高自己的攻击。

Name: Bestow
Description (Short): User passes its held item to the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 当对手未携带道具时，能够将自己携带的道具交给对手。

Name: Bide

Description (Chinese Short): 在２回合内忍受攻击，受到的伤害会２倍返还给对手。

Name: Bite

Name: Black Hole Eclipse

Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量收集恶能量，全力将对手吸入，威力会根据原来的招式而改变。

Name: Blast Burn

Description (Chinese Short): 用爆炸的火焰烧尽对手进行攻击，下一回合自己将无法动弹。

Name: Blaze Kick

Name: Bloom Doom

Name: Blue Flare
Description (Short): 20% chance to burn the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用美丽而激烈的青焰包裹住对手进行攻击，有时会让对手陷入灼伤状态，20%几率令目标烧伤。

Name: Body Press

Description (Chinese Short): 用身体撞向对手进行攻击，防御越高，给予的伤害就越高。

Name: Body Slam
Description (Short): 30% chance to paralyze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用整个身体压住对手进行攻击，有时会让对手陷入麻痹状态，30%几率令目标麻痹。

Name: Bolt Beak
Description (Short): Power doubles if user moves before the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用带电的喙啄刺对手，如果比对手先出手攻击，招试的威力会变为2倍。

Name: Bolt Strike
Description (Short): 20% chance to paralyze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 让强大的电流覆盖全身，猛撞向对手进行攻击，有时会让对手陷入麻痹状态，20%几率令目标麻痹。

Name: Bone Club
Description (Short): 10% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用手中的骨头殴打对手进行攻击，有时会使对手畏缩，10%几率令目标畏缩。

Name: Bounce

Name: Bouncy Bubble

Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。令目标的攻击降低1级。

Name: Breakneck Blitz

Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量气势猛烈地全力撞上对手。威力会根据原来的招式而改变。

Name: Brick Break
Description (Short): Destroys screens, unless the target is immune.
Description (Chinese Short): 破坏对方场地的光墙、反射壁和极光幕，并攻击目标造成伤害。不受反射壁和极光幕的伤害降低影响。

Name: Brine

Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。如果目标的ＨＰ为其最大ＨＰ的1⁄2或以下，威力翻倍。

Name: Bubble

Name: Bug Buzz

Name: Bullet Seed

Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害，一回合内连续攻击2～5次。

Name: Burning Jealousy
Description (Short): 100% burns a target that had a stat rise this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 令该回合内能力变化曾提高过的宝可梦陷入灼伤状态。

Name: Burn Up

Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。使用后自身火属性变成无属性，其他属性的顺位不会改变，离场后恢复。

Name: Buzzy Buzz

Name: Captivate

Name: Catastropika

Name: Celebrate

Name: Charge

Description (Chinese Short): 使自身进入充电状态持续1回合。电属性招式的威力加倍。同时还令使用者的特防提升1级。

Name: Charge Beam

Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。70%几率令使用者的特攻提升1级。

Description (Chinese Short): 令目标的攻击降低2级。

Name: Clangorous Soulblaze

Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。令使用者的攻击、防御、特攻、特防和速度提升1级。

Description (Chinese Short): 将对手所有的能力变化的等级回归为0级。

Name: Close Combat

Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。令使用者的防御降低1级。令使用者的特防降低1级。

Description (Short): 10% chance to burn the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手发射烈焰进行攻击。10%几率让对手陷入灼伤状态。

Name: Flare Blitz
Description (Short): Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to burn. Thaws user.
Description (Chinese Short): 让火焰覆盖全身猛撞向对手。自己也会受到33%的伤害。有10%几率让对手陷入灼伤状态。

Name: Flash
Description (Short): Lowers the target's accuracy by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 使出耀眼光芒，100%几率降低对手的命中率1级。

Name: Flash Cannon
Description (Short): 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 将身体的光芒聚集在一点释放出去。10%几率降低对手的特防1级。

Name: Flatter
Description (Short): Raises the target's Sp. Atk by 1 and confuses it.
Description (Chinese Short): 吹捧对手，使其混乱。同时还会提高对手的特攻1级。

Name: Fleur Cannon
Description (Short): Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 放出强力光束后，自己的特攻会降低2级。

Name: Fling
Description (Short): Flings the user's item at the target. Power varies.
Description (Chinese Short): 快速投掷携带的道具进行攻击。根据道具不同，威力和效果会改变。

Name: Flip Turn
Description (Short): User switches out after damaging the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 在攻击之后急速返回，和后备宝可梦进行替换。

Name: Floaty Fall
Description (Short): 30% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 轻飘飘地浮起来后，再猛地俯冲下去进行攻击。有30%几率会使对手畏缩。

Name: Floral Healing
Description (Short): Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 回复目标最大ＨＰ的一半。在青草场地时，回复目标2/3的HP。

Name: Flower Shield
Description (Short): Raises Defense by 1 of all active Grass types.
Description (Chinese Short): 使用神奇的力量提高在场的所有草属性宝可梦的防御提高1级。

Name: Fly
Description (Short): Flies up on first turn, then strikes the next turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 第１回合飞上天空，第２回合攻击对手。

Name: Flying Press
Description (Short): Combines Flying in its type effectiveness.
Description (Chinese Short): 从空中俯冲向对手。此招式同时带有格斗属性和飞行属性。

Name: Focus Blast
Description (Short): 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 提高气势，释放出全部力量。10%几率降低对手的特防1级。

Name: Focus Energy
Description (Short): Raises the user's critical hit ratio by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 深深地吸口气，集中精神。使自身进入易中要害状态，处于易中要害状态的宝可梦击中要害概率提升2级。

Name: Focus Punch
Description (Short): Fails if the user takes damage before it hits.
Description (Chinese Short): 集中精神出拳。在招式使出前若受到攻击则会失败。

Name: Follow Me
Description (Short): The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.
Description (Chinese Short): 引起对手的注意，将对手的攻击全部转移到自己身上。

Name: Force Palm
Description (Short): 30% chance to paralyze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手的身体发出冲击波进行攻击。30%几率会让对手陷入麻痹状态。

Name: Foresight
Description (Short): Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.
Description (Chinese Short): 对幽灵属性宝可梦没有效果的招式以及闪避率高的对手，使用后变得能够打中。

Name: Forest's Curse
Description (Short): Adds Grass to the target's type(s).
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手施加森林诅咒。中了诅咒的对手会被追加草属性。

Name: Foul Play
Description (Short): Uses target's Attack stat in damage calculation.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用对手的力量进行攻击。正和自己战斗的对手，其攻击越高，伤害越大。

Name: Freeze-Dry
Description (Short): 10% chance to freeze. Super effective on Water.
Description (Chinese Short): 急剧冷冻对手，有10%几率让对手陷入冰冻状态。对于水属性宝可梦造成效果绝佳。

Name: Freeze Shock
Description (Short): Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. 30% paralyze.
Description (Chinese Short): 用覆盖着电流的冰块，在第２回合撞向对手。有30%几率让对手陷入麻痹状态。

Name: Freezing Glare
Description (Short): 10% chance to freeze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 从双眼发射精神力量进行攻击。10%几率让对手陷入冰冻状态。

Name: Freezy Frost
Description (Short): Eliminates all stat changes.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用冰冷的黑雾结晶进行攻击。使全体宝可梦的能力变回原点。

Name: Frenzy Plant
Description (Short): User cannot move next turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 用大树摔打对手进行攻击。下一回合自己将无法动弹。

Name: Frost Breath
Description (Short): Always results in a critical hit.
Description (Chinese Short): 将冰冷的气息吹向对手进行攻击。必定会击中要害。

Name: Frustration
Description (Short): Max 102 power at minimum Happiness.
Description (Chinese Short): 为了发泄不满而全力攻击对手。亲密度越低，威力越大。

Name: Fury Attack
Description (Short): Hits 2-5 times in one turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 用角或喙刺向对手进行攻击。连续攻击２～５次。

Name: Fury Cutter
Description (Short): Power doubles with each hit, up to 160.
Description (Chinese Short): 用镰刀或爪子等切斩对手进行攻击。连续击中，威力就会提高。

Name: Fury Swipes
Description (Short): Hits 2-5 times in one turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 用爪子或镰刀等抓对手进行攻击。连续攻击２～５次。

Name: Fusion Bolt
Description (Short): Power doubles if used after Fusion Flare this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 释放出巨大的闪电。受到巨大的火焰影响时，招式威力翻倍。

Name: Fusion Flare
Description (Short): Power doubles if used after Fusion Bolt this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 释放出巨大的火焰。受到巨大的闪电影响时，招式威力会提高。

Name: Future Sight
Description (Short): Hits two turns after being used.
Description (Chinese Short): 在使用招式２回合后，向对手发送一团念力进行攻击。

Name: Gastro Acid
Description (Short): Nullifies the target's Ability.
Description (Chinese Short): 将胃液吐向对手的身体。沾上的胃液会消除对手的特性效果。

Name: Gear Grind
Description (Short): Hits 2 times in one turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手投掷钢铁齿轮进行攻击。连续２次给予伤害。

Name: Gear Up
Description (Short): Raises Atk, Sp. Atk of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 启动齿轮，令己方提高特性为正电和负电的宝可梦的攻击和特攻各1级。

Name: Genesis Supernova
Description (Short): Summons Psychic Terrain.
Description (Chinese Short): 得到Ｚ力量的梦幻将全力攻击对手。脚下会变成精神场地。

Name: Geomancy
Description (Short): Charges, then raises SpA, SpD, Spe by 2 turn 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 第１回合吸收能量，第２回合提高特攻、特防和速度各2级。

Name: Giga Drain
Description (Short): User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.
Description (Chinese Short): 吸取对手的养分进行攻击。可以回复对手所受伤害的一半ＨＰ。

Name: Giga Impact
Description (Short): User cannot move next turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 使出自己浑身力量突击对手。下一回合自己将无法动弹。

Name: Gigavolt Havoc
Description (Short): Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量将蓄积的强大电流全力撞向对手。威力会根据原来的招式而改变。

Name: Glacial Lance
Description (Short): No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手投掷掀起暴风雪的冰矛进行攻击。

Name: Glaciate
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 将冰冻的冷气吹向对手进行攻击。100%几率降低对手的速度1级。

Name: Glare
Description (Short): Paralyzes the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用腹部的花纹使对手害怕，从而让其陷入麻痹状态。

Name: Glitzy Glow
Description (Short): Summons Light Screen.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用念力强攻，粉碎对方信心。制造一道能减弱对手特殊攻击的神奇墙壁。

Name: G-Max Befuddle
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: slp or psn or par.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的巴大蝶使出的虫属性攻击。会让对手陷入中毒、麻痹或睡眠状态中的一种。

Name: G-Max Cannonade
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的水箭龟使出的水属性攻击。在４回合内每回合给予对手损失最大HP1/6的伤害。

Name: G-Max Centiferno
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: bound 4-5 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的焚焰蚣使出的火属性攻击。可在４～５回合内将对手困在火焰中。

Name: G-Max Chi Strike
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Allies: Crit Ratio +1.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的怪力使出的格斗属性攻击。自身击中要害等级提升1级。

Name: G-Max Cuddle
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: infatuated.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的伊布使出的一般属性攻击。会让性别相对的对手陷入着迷状态。

Name: G-Max Depletion
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: last move -2 PP.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的铝钢龙使出的龙属性攻击。对手最后使用的招式的ＰＰ减2。

Name: G-Max Drum Solo
Description (Short): Stronger than other Max Moves. Ignores abilities.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的轰擂金刚猩使出的草属性攻击。不会受到对手特性的干扰。

Name: G-Max Finale
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Allies: +1/6 max HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的霜奶仙使出的妖精属性攻击。可回复我方的所有宝可梦当前最大1/6的ＨＰ。

Name: G-Max Fireball
Description (Short): Stronger than other Max Moves. Ignores abilities.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的闪焰王牌使出的火属性攻击。不会受到对手特性的干扰。

Name: G-Max Foam Burst
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -2 Speed.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的巨钳蟹使出的水属性攻击。100%几率令对手全部宝可梦速度降低2级。

Name: G-Max Gold Rush
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: confused.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的喵喵使出的一般属性攻击。会让对手全员陷入混乱状态，并可获得金钱。

Name: G-Max Gravitas
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Starts Gravity.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的以欧路普使出的超能力属性攻击。在５回合内重力会产生变化，包括使用技能的本回合。

Name: G-Max Hydrosnipe
Description (Short): Stronger than other Max Moves. Ignores abilities.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的千面避役使出的水属性攻击。不会受到对手特性的干扰。

Name: G-Max Malodor
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: poisoned.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的灰尘山使出的毒属性攻击。会让对手陷入中毒状态。

Name: G-Max Meltdown
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: Tormented.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的美录梅塔使出的钢属性攻击。会让对手所有宝可梦2回合无法连续使出相同的招式。

Name: G-Max One Blow
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Breaks all protection.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的武道熊师使出的恶属性攻击。是可以无视极巨防壁的一击。

Name: G-Max Rapid Flow
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Breaks all protection.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的武道熊师使出的水属性攻击。是可以无视极巨防壁的连击。

Name: G-Max Replenish
Description (Short): Base move affects power. 50% restores Berries.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的卡比兽使出的一般属性攻击。50%的几率获得已经使用过的树果。

Name: G-Max Resonance
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Allies: Aurora Veil.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的拉普拉斯使出的冰属性攻击。可在５回合内受到的伤害减半。场上存在其他己方宝可梦则只降低1/3

Name: G-Max Sandblast
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: bound 4-5 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的沙螺蟒使出的地面属性攻击。使目标陷入束缚状态持续４～５回合。

Name: G-Max Smite
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: confused.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的布莉姆温使出的妖精属性攻击。会让对手陷入混乱状态。

Name: G-Max Snooze
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Target: 50% Yawn.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的长毛巨魔使出的恶属性攻击。有50%概率会通过打大哈欠让目标陷入瞌睡状态。

Name: G-Max Steelsurge
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: Steel hazard.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的大王铜象使出的钢属性攻击。向对手场地撒下尖锐的刺，使交换上场的宝可梦受到满HP1/8的伤害。

Name: G-Max Stonesurge
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: Stealth Rock.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的暴噬龟使出的水属性攻击。向对手场地撒下尖锐的岩石，使交换上场的宝可梦受到满HP1/8的伤害。

Name: G-Max Stun Shock
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: psn or par.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的颤弦蝾螈使出的电属性攻击。会让对手陷入中毒或麻痹状态。

Name: G-Max Sweetness
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Allies: status cured.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的丰蜜龙使出的草属性攻击。会治愈我方的异常状态。

Name: G-Max Tartness
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1 evasiveness.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的苹裹龙使出的草属性攻击。会降低对手的闪避率。

Name: G-Max Terror
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: trapped.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的耿鬼使出的幽灵属性攻击。会踩住对手的影子，让其无法被替换。

Name: G-Max Vine Lash
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的妙蛙花使出的草属性攻击。会在回合结束对草属性以外的宝可梦损失最大HP的1/6，持续4回合。

Name: G-Max Volcalith
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的巨炭山使出的岩石属性攻击。会在回合结束对岩石属性以外的宝可梦损失最大HP的1/6，持续4回合。

Name: G-Max Volt Crash
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: paralyzed.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的皮卡丘使出的电属性攻击。会让对手所有宝可梦陷入麻痹状态。

Name: G-Max Wildfire
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的喷火龙使出的火属性攻击。会在回合结束对火属性以外的宝可梦损失最大HP的1/6，持续4回合。

Name: G-Max Wind Rage
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Ends Terrain, hazards.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的钢铠鸦使出的飞行属性攻击。可消除反射壁、光墙、撒菱和场地型状态等的效果。

Name: Grass Knot
Description (Short): More power the heavier the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用草缠住并绊倒对手。对手越重，威力越大。

Name: Grass Pledge
Description (Short): Use with Fire or Water Pledge for added effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 用草柱进行攻击。和火之誓约或水之誓约混合使用，效果更佳。

Name: Grass Whistle
Description (Short): Causes the target to fall asleep.
Description (Chinese Short): 让对手听舒适的笛声，从而陷入睡眠状态。

Name: Grassy Glide
Description (Short): User on Grassy Terrain: +1 priority.
Description (Chinese Short): 仿佛在地面上滑行般地攻击对手。在地面上的宝可梦，必定能够先制攻击。

Name: Grassy Terrain
Description (Short): 5 turns. Grounded: +Grass power, +1/16 max HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内变成青草场地。地面上的宝可梦每回合都能回复少许HP。草属性的招式威力还会提高30%。

Name: Grav Apple
Description (Short): Target: 100% -1 Def. During Gravity: 1.5x power.
Description (Chinese Short): 从高处落下苹果，给予对手伤害。100%几率降低对手防御1级。处于重力状态威力提升50%。

Name: Gravity
Description (Short): 5 turns: no Ground immunities, 1.67x accuracy.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内，飘浮特性和飞行属性的宝可梦会被地面属性的招式击中。飞向空中的招式也将无法使用。

Name: Growl
Description (Short): Lowers the foe(s) Attack by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 让对手听可爱的叫声，引开注意力使其疏忽，降低目标攻击1级。

Name: Growth
Description (Short): Raises user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1; 2 in Sun.
Description (Chinese Short): 让身体一下子长大，100%几率提高自身攻击和特攻各1级。

Name: Grudge
Description (Short): If the user faints, the attack used loses all its PP.
Description (Chinese Short): 因对手的招式而陷入濒死时给对手施加怨念，让该招式的ＰＰ变成０。

Name: Guardian of Alola
Description (Short): Does damage equal to 3/4 target's current HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量得到阿罗拉之力的土地神宝可梦将全力进行攻击。给予对手剩余3/4HP的伤害。攻击必定会命中。对手使用防住类招式则造成对手剩余3/16HP的伤害。

Name: Guard Split
Description (Short): Averages Defense and Sp. Def stats with target.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用超能力将自己和对手的防御和特防相加，再进行平分。

Name: Guard Swap
Description (Short): Swaps Defense and Sp. Def changes with target.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用超能力互换自己和对手的防御以及特防的能力变化。

Name: Guillotine
Description (Short): OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.
Description (Chinese Short): 用大钳子或剪刀等夹断对手进行攻击。只要命中就会一击濒死。

Name: Gunk Shot
Description (Short): 30% chance to poison the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用肮脏的垃圾撞向对手进行攻击。30%几率让对手陷入中毒状态。

Name: Gust
Description (Short): Power doubles during Bounce, Fly, and Sky Drop.
Description (Chinese Short): 用翅膀将刮起的狂风袭向对手进行攻击，目标处于飞翔状态威力翻倍。可击中飞翔状态宝可梦。

Name: Gyro Ball
Description (Short): More power the slower the user than the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 让身体高速旋转并撞击对手。速度比对手越慢，威力越大。

Name: Hail
Description (Short): For 5 turns, hail crashes down.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内一直降冰雹，除冰属性的宝可梦以外，给予全体宝可梦伤害。

Name: Hammer Arm
Description (Short): Lowers the user's Speed by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 挥舞强力而沉重的拳头，给予对手伤害。令使用者的速度降低1级。

Name: Happy Hour
Description (Short): No competitive use.
Description (Chinese Short): 如果使用欢乐时光，战斗后得到的钱会翻倍。

Name: Harden
Description (Short): Raises the user's Defense by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 全身使劲，让身体变硬，提高使用者的防御1级。

Name: Haze
Description (Short): Eliminates all stat changes.
Description (Chinese Short): 升起黑雾，将正在场上战斗的全体宝可梦的能力变回原点。

Name: Headbutt
Description (Short): 30% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 将头伸出，笔直地扑向对手进行攻击。30%几率使对手畏缩。

Name: Head Charge
Description (Short): Has 1/4 recoil.
Description (Chinese Short): 用厉害的爆炸头猛撞向对手进行攻击。自己也会受到造成伤害的25%的伤害。

Name: Head Smash
Description (Short): Has 1/2 recoil.
Description (Chinese Short): 拼命使出浑身力气，向对手进行头锤攻击。自己也会受到造成伤害的50%的伤害。

Name: Heal Bell
Description (Short): Cures the user's party of all status conditions.
Description (Chinese Short): 让同伴听舒适的铃音，从而治愈我方全员的异常状态。

Name: Heal Block
Description (Short): For 5 turns, the foe(s) is prevented from healing.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内无法通过招式、特性或携带的道具来回复ＨＰ。

Name: Healing Wish
Description (Short): User faints. Next hurt Pokemon is fully healed.
Description (Chinese Short): 虽然自己陷入濒死，但可以治愈后备上场的宝可梦的异常状态以及所有ＨＰ。

Name: Heal Order
Description (Short): Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 召唤手下疗伤。回复自己最大ＨＰ的一半。

Name: Heal Pulse
Description (Short): Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 放出治愈波动，从而回复对手最大ＨＰ的一半。

Name: Heart Stamp
Description (Short): 30% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 以可爱的动作使对手疏忽，乘机给出强烈的一击。30%几率使对手畏缩。

Name: Heart Swap
Description (Short): Swaps all stat changes with target.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用超能力互换自己和对手之间的能力变化。

Name: Heat Crash
Description (Short): More power the heavier the user than the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用燃烧的身体撞向对手进行攻击。自己比对手越重，威力越大

Name: Heat Wave
Description (Short): 10% chance to burn the foe(s).
Description (Chinese Short): 将炎热的气息吹向对手进行攻击。10%几率让对手陷入灼伤状态。

Name: Heavy Slam
Description (Short): More power the heavier the user than the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用沉重的身体撞向对手进行攻击。自己比对手越重，威力越大。

Name: Helping Hand
Description (Short): One adjacent ally's move power is 1.5x this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 帮助伙伴。被帮助的宝可梦，其招式威力在本回合结束前提升50%。

Name: Hex
Description (Short): Power doubles if the target has a status ailment.
Description (Chinese Short): 接二连三地进行攻击。攻击处于异常状态的对手威力翻倍。

Name: Hidden Power
Description (Chinese Short): 招式的属性会随着使用此招式的宝可梦而改变。

Name: High Horsepower
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 使出全身力量，猛攻对手。

Name: High Jump Kick
Description (Short): User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.
Description (Chinese Short): 跳起后用膝盖撞对手进行攻击。若没有命中自身损失最大HP一半HP。

Name: Hold Back
Description (Short): Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 在攻击的时候手下留情，从而使对手的ＨＰ至少会留下１ＨＰ。

Name: Hold Hands
Description (Short): No competitive use.
Description (Chinese Short): 我方宝可梦之间牵手。能带来非常幸福的心情。

Name: Hone Claws
Description (Short): Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 将爪子磨得更加锋利。提高自己的攻击和命中率各1级。

Name: Horn Attack
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 用尖锐的角攻击对手。

Name: Horn Drill
Description (Short): OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.
Description (Chinese Short): 用旋转的角刺入对手进行攻击。只要命中就会一击濒死。

Name: Horn Leech
Description (Short): User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.
Description (Chinese Short): 将角刺入，吸取对手的养分。可以回复给予对手伤害的一半ＨＰ。

Name: Howl
Description (Short): Raises the user's and ally's Attack by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 大声吼叫提高气势，从而提高自己的攻击1级。

Name: Hurricane
Description (Short): 30% chance to confuse target. Can't miss in rain.
Description (Chinese Short): 用强烈的风席卷对手进行攻击。30%几率使对手混乱。

Name: Hydro Cannon
Description (Short): User cannot move next turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手喷射水炮进行攻击。下一回合自己将无法动弹。

Name: Hydro Pump
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手猛烈地喷射大量水流进行攻击。

Name: Hydro Vortex
Description (Short): Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量制造大大的潮旋，全力吞没对手。威力会根据原来的招式而改变。

Name: Hyper Beam
Description (Short): User cannot move next turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手发射强烈的光线进行攻击。下一回合自己将无法动弹。

Name: Hyper Fang
Description (Short): 10% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用锋利的门牙牢牢地咬住对手进行攻击。20%几率使对手畏缩。

Name: Hyperspace Fury
Description (Short): Hoopa-U: Lowers user's Def by 1; breaks protect.
Description (Chinese Short): 用许多手臂，无视对手的守住或看穿等招式进行连续攻击，使用者防御会降低1级。

Name: Hyperspace Hole
Description (Short): Breaks the target's protection for this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过异次元洞，突然出现在对手的侧面进行攻击。还可以无视守住和看穿等招式。

Name: Hyper Voice
Description (Short): No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.
Description (Chinese Short): 给予对手又吵又响的巨大震动进行攻击。

Name: Hypnosis
Description (Short): Causes the target to fall asleep.
Description (Chinese Short): 施以诱导睡意的暗示，让对手陷入睡眠状态。

Name: Ice Ball
Description (Short): Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内强制攻击对手。招式每次击中，威力就会提高。

Name: Ice Beam
Description (Short): 10% chance to freeze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手发射冰冻光束进行攻击。10%几率让对手陷入冰冻状态。

Name: Ice Burn
Description (Short): Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. 30% burn.
Description (Chinese Short): 用能够冻结一切的强烈冷气，在第２回合包裹住对手。30%几率让对手陷入灼伤状态。

Name: Ice Fang
Description (Short): 10% chance to freeze. 10% chance to flinch.
Description (Chinese Short): 用藏有冷气的牙齿咬住对手。10%几率使对手畏缩或陷入冰冻状态。

Name: Ice Hammer
Description (Short): Lowers the user's Speed by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 挥舞强力而沉重的拳头，给予对手伤害。令使用者的速度降低1级。

Name: Ice Punch
Description (Short): 10% chance to freeze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用充满寒气的拳头攻击对手。10%几率让对手陷入冰冻状态。

Name: Ice Shard
Description (Short): Usually goes first.
Description (Chinese Short): 瞬间制作冰块，快速地扔向对手。必定能够先制攻击。

Name: Icicle Crash
Description (Short): 30% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用大冰柱激烈地撞向对手进行攻击。30%几率使对手畏缩。

Name: Icicle Spear
Description (Short): Hits 2-5 times in one turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手发射锋利的冰柱进行攻击。连续攻击２～５次。

Name: Icy Wind
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 将结冰的冷气吹向对手进行攻击。100%几率降低目标的速度1级。

Name: Imprison
Description (Short): No foe can use any move known by the user.
Description (Chinese Short): 如果对手有和自己相同的招式，那么只有对手无法使用该招式。

Name: Incinerate
Description (Short): Destroys the foe(s) Berry/Gem.
Description (Chinese Short): 用火焰攻击对手。对手携带树果或宝石时，会烧掉，使其不能使用。

Name: Inferno
Description (Short): 100% chance to burn the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用烈焰包裹住对手进行攻击。100%几率让对手陷入灼伤状态。

Name: Inferno Overdrive
Description (Short): Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量喷出熊熊烈火，全力撞向对手。威力会根据原来的招式而改变。

Name: Infestation
Description (Short): Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 在４～５回合内死缠烂打地进行攻击。在此期间对手将无法逃走。

Name: Ingrain
Description (Short): Traps/grounds user; heals 1/16 max HP per turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 在大地上扎根，每回合回复自己满HP的1/16ＨＰ。因为扎根了，所以不能替换宝可梦。

Name: Instruct
Description (Short): The target immediately uses its last used move.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手下达指示，让其再次使出刚才的招式。

Name: Ion Deluge
Description (Short): Normal moves become Electric type this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 将带电粒子扩散开来，使一般属性的招式变成电属性。

Name: Iron Defense
Description (Short): Raises the user's Defense by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 将皮肤变得坚硬如铁，从而提高自己的防御2级。

Name: Iron Head
Description (Short): 30% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用钢铁般坚硬的头部进行攻击。30%几率使对手畏缩。

Name: Iron Tail

Description (Chinese Short): 使用坚硬的尾巴摔打对手进行攻击。30%几率降低对手的防御1级。

Name: Jaw Lock

Description (Chinese Short): 使双方直到一方濒死为止无法替换宝可梦。其中一方退场则可以解除效果。

Name: Judgment
Description (Short): Type varies based on the held Plate.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手放出无数的光弹。属性会根据自己携带的石板不同而改变。

Name: Jump Kick
Description (Short): User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.
Description (Chinese Short): 使出高高的腾空踢攻击对手。若没有命中自身损失最大HP的一半HP。

Name: Jungle Healing
Description (Short): User and allies: healed 1/4 max HP, status cured.
Description (Chinese Short): 与丛林融为一体，回复自己和场上同伴的1/4ＨＰ并治愈所有异常状态。

Name: Karate Chop
Description (Short): High critical hit ratio.
Description (Chinese Short): 用锋利的手刀劈向对手进行攻击。容易击中要害。

Name: Kinesis
Description (Short): Lowers the target's accuracy by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 折弯汤匙引开注意，从而降低对手的命中率1级。

Name: King's Shield
Description (Short): Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -1 Atk.
Description (Chinese Short): 防住对手攻击的同时，自己变为防御姿态。降低所接触到的对手的攻击。

Name: Knock Off
Description (Short): 1.5x damage if foe holds an item. Removes item.
Description (Chinese Short): 拍落对手的持有物，直到战斗结束都不能使用。对手携带道具时伤害提升50%。

Name: Land's Wrath
Description (Short): No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.
Description (Chinese Short): 聚集大地的力量，将此力量集中攻击对手，并给予伤害。

Name: Laser Focus
Description (Short): Until the end of the next turn, user's moves crit.
Description (Chinese Short): 集中精神，下次攻击必定会击中要害。

Name: Lash Out
Description (Short): 2x power if the user had a stat lowered this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击对手以发泄对其感到的恼怒情绪。如果在该回合内自身能力遭到降低，招式的威力会变成２倍。

Name: Last Resort
Description (Short): Fails unless each known move has been used.
Description (Chinese Short): 当战斗中已学会的招式全部使用过后，才能开始使出珍藏的招式。

Name: Lava Plume
Description (Short): 30% chance to burn adjacent Pokemon.
Description (Chinese Short): 用熊熊烈火攻击自己周围所有的宝可梦。30%几率使目标会陷入灼伤状态。

Name: Leafage
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 将叶片打向对手，进行攻击。

Name: Leaf Blade
Description (Short): High critical hit ratio.
Description (Chinese Short): 像用剑一般操纵叶片切斩对手进行攻击。容易击中要害。

Name: Leaf Storm
Description (Short): Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 用尖尖的叶片向对手卷起风暴。使用之后因为反作用力会使自己的特攻降低2级。

Name: Leaf Tornado
Description (Short): 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 用锋利的叶片包裹住对手进行攻击。50%几率降低对手的命中率1级。

Name: Leech Life
Description (Short): User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.
Description (Chinese Short): 吸取血液攻击对手。可以回复给予对手伤害的一半ＨＰ。

Name: Leech Seed
Description (Short): 1/8 of target's HP is restored to user every turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 植入寄生种子后，将在每回合一点一点吸取对手最大HP1/8的ＨＰ，从而用来回复自己的ＨＰ。

Name: Leer
Description (Short): Lowers the foe(s) Defense by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 用犀利的眼神使其害怕，从而降低对手的防御1级。

Name: Let's Snuggle Forever
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 得到Ｚ力量的谜拟Ｑ将全力进行乱揍攻击。

Name: Lick
Description (Short): 30% chance to paralyze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用长长的舌头，舔遍对手进行攻击。30%几率让对手陷入麻痹状态。

Name: Life Dew
Description (Short): Heals the user and its allies by 1/4 their max HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 喷洒出神奇的水，回复自己和场上同伴1/4的ＨＰ。

Name: Light of Ruin
Description (Short): Has 1/2 recoil.
Description (Chinese Short): 借用永恒之花的力量，发射出强力光线。自己也会受到造成伤害的一半的伤害。

Name: Light Screen
Description (Short): For 5 turns, special damage to allies is halved.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内使用神奇的墙，从对手那受到的特殊攻击的伤害减半。

Name: Light That Burns the Sky
Description (Short): Physical if user's Atk > Sp. Atk. Ignores Abilities.
Description (Chinese Short): 奈克洛兹玛会无视对手的特性效果，在攻击和特攻之间，用数值相对较高的一项给予对方伤害。

Name: Liquidation
Description (Short): 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 用水之力量撞向对手进行攻击。20%几率降低对手的防御1级。

Name: Lock-On
Description (Short): User's next move will not miss the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 紧紧瞄准对手，下次攻击必定会打中。

Name: Lovely Kiss
Description (Short): Causes the target to fall asleep.
Description (Chinese Short): 用恐怖的脸强吻对手。让对手陷入睡眠状态。

Name: Low Kick

Description (Chinese Short): 用力踢对手的脚，使其摔倒进行攻击。对手越重，威力越大。

Name: Low Sweep
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 以敏捷的动作瞄准对手的脚进行攻击。100%几率降低对手的速度1级。

Name: Lucky Chant
Description (Short): For 5 turns, shields user's party from critical hits.
Description (Chinese Short): 向天许愿，从而在５回合内不会被对手的攻击打中要害。

Name: Lunar Dance

Description (Chinese Short): 虽然自己陷入濒死，但可以治愈后备上场的宝可梦的全部HP和异常状态。

Name: Lunge
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 全力猛扑对手进行攻击。100%几率降低对手的攻击1级。

Name: Luster Purge
Description (Short): 50% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 释放耀眼的光芒进行攻击。50%几率降低对手的特防1级。

Name: Mach Punch
Description (Short): Usually goes first.
Description (Chinese Short): 以迅雷不及掩耳之势出拳。必定能够先制攻击。

Name: Magical Leaf
Description (Short): This move does not check accuracy.
Description (Chinese Short): 散落可以追踪对手的神奇叶片。攻击必定会命中。

Name: Magic Coat
Description (Short): Bounces back certain non-damaging moves.
Description (Chinese Short): 当对手使出会变成异常状态的招式或寄生种子等时，会将对手的招式反射回去。

Name: Magic Powder
Description (Short): Changes the target's type to Psychic.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手喷洒魔法粉，使对手变为超能力属性。

Name: Magic Room
Description (Short): For 5 turns, all held items have no effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 制造出离奇的空间。在５回合内所有宝可梦携带道具的效果都会消失。

Name: Magma Storm
Description (Short): Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 将对手困在熊熊燃烧的火焰中，在４～５回合内进行攻击。

Name: Magnet Bomb
Description (Short): This move does not check accuracy.
Description (Chinese Short): 发射吸住对手的钢铁炸弹。攻击必定会命中。

Name: Magnetic Flux
Description (Short): Raises Def, Sp. Def of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过操控磁场，100%几率提高己方所有特性为正电和负电的宝可梦的防御和特防各1级。

Name: Magnet Rise
Description (Short): For 5 turns, the user has immunity to Ground.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用电气产生的磁力浮在空中。在５回合内可以飘浮。

Name: Magnitude

Description (Chinese Short): 晃动地面，攻击自己周围所有的宝可梦。招式的威力会有各种变化。

Name: Malicious Moonsault

Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量得到强壮肉体的炽焰咆哮虎将全力撞向对手进行攻击。

Name: Mat Block

Description (Chinese Short): 将掀起来的榻榻米当作盾牌，防住自己和同伴免受招式伤害。变化招式无法防住。

Name: Max Airstream

Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的飞行属性攻击。100%几率提升我方的速度1级。

Name: Max Darkness

Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的恶属性攻击。100%几率降低对手的特防1级。

Name: Max Flare

Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的火属性攻击。可在５回合内将天气变为大晴天。

Name: Max Flutterby
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Sp. Atk.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的虫属性攻击。100%几率降低对手的特攻1级。

Name: Max Geyser

Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的水属性攻击。可在５回合内将天气变为降雨。

Name: Max Guard

Description (Chinese Short): 完全抵挡对手的攻击。连续使出则容易失败。

Name: Max Hailstorm
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Starts Hail.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦才能使出的冰属性攻击。在５回合内会降下冰雹。

Name: Max Knuckle

Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的格斗属性攻击。100%几率提升我方的攻击1级。

Name: Max Lightning

Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的电属性攻击。可在５回合内将脚下变成电气场地。

Name: Max Mindstorm

Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的超能力属性攻击。可在５回合内将脚下变成精神场地。

Name: Max Ooze

Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的毒属性攻击。100%几率提升我方的特攻1级。

Name: Max Overgrowth

Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的幽灵属性攻击。100%几率降低对手的防御1级。

Name: Max Quake

Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的地面属性攻击。100%几率提升我方的特防1级。

Name: Max Rockfall

Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的岩石属性攻击。可在５回合内将天气变为沙暴。

Name: Punishment
Description (Short): 60 power +20 for each of the target's stat boosts.
Description (Chinese Short): 根据能力变化，对手提高的力量越大，招式的威力越大。

Name: Purify
Description (Short): Cures target's status; heals user 1/2 max HP if so.
Description (Chinese Short): 治愈对手的异常状态。治愈后可以回复自身最大HP的一半。

Name: Pursuit
Description (Short): If a foe is switching out, hits it at 2x power.
Description (Chinese Short): 当对手替换宝可梦上场时使出此招式的话，能够以２倍的威力进行攻击。

Name: Pyro Ball
Description (Short): 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.
Description (Chinese Short): 点燃小石子，形成火球攻击对手。10%几率使对手陷入灼伤状态。

Name: Quash
Description (Short): Forces the target to move last this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 压制对手，从而将其行动顺序放到最后。

Name: Quick Attack
Description (Short): Usually goes first.
Description (Chinese Short): 以迅雷不及掩耳之势扑向对手。必定能够先制攻击。

Name: Quick Guard
Description (Short): Protects allies from priority attacks this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 守护自己和同伴，以防对手的先制攻击。

Name: Quiver Dance
Description (Short): Raises the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 轻巧地跳起神秘而又美丽的舞蹈。提高自己的特攻、特防和速度各1级。

Name: Rage
Description (Short): Raises the user's Attack by 1 if hit during use.
Description (Chinese Short): 如果在使出招式后受到攻击的话，会因愤怒的力量而提高自身攻击1级。

Name: Rage Powder
Description (Short): The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.
Description (Chinese Short): 将令人烦躁的粉末撒在自己身上，用以吸引对手的注意。使对手的攻击全部指向自己。

Name: Rain Dance
Description (Short): For 5 turns, heavy rain powers Water moves.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内一直降雨，从而提高水属性的招式威力。火属性的招式威力则降低。

Name: Rapid Spin
Description (Short): Free user from hazards/bind/Leech Seed; +1 Spe.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过旋转来攻击对手。100%几率提升自身速度1级。还可以摆脱绑紧、紧束、寄生种子和撒菱等招式。

Name: Razor Leaf
Description (Short): High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.
Description (Chinese Short): 飞出叶片，切斩对手进行攻击。容易击中要害。

Name: Razor Shell
Description (Short): 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 用锋利的贝壳切斩对手进行攻击。50%几率降低对手的防御1级。

Name: Razor Wind
Description (Short): Charges, then hits foe(s) turn 2. High crit ratio.
Description (Chinese Short): 制造风之刃，于第２回合攻击对手。容易击中要害。

Name: Recover
Description (Short): Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 让全身的细胞获得再生，回复最大HP一半的ＨＰ。

Name: Recycle
Description (Short): Restores the item the user last used.
Description (Chinese Short): 使战斗中已经消耗掉的自己的持有物再生，并可以再次使用。

Name: Reflect
Description (Short): For 5 turns, physical damage to allies is halved.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内使用神奇的墙，从对手那受到的物理攻击的伤害减半。

Name: Reflect Type
Description (Short): User becomes the same type as the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 反射对手的属性，让自己也变成一样的属性。

Name: Refresh
Description (Short): User cures its burn, poison, or paralysis.
Description (Chinese Short): 让身体休息，治愈自己身上所中的毒、麻痹、灼伤的异常状态。

Name: Relic Song
Description (Short): 10% chance to sleep foe(s). Meloetta transforms.
Description (Chinese Short): 让对手听古老之歌，打动对手的内心进行攻击。10%几率让对手陷入睡眠状态。

Name: Rest
Description (Short): User sleeps 2 turns and restores HP and status.
Description (Chinese Short): 连续睡上２回合。回复自己的全部ＨＰ以及治愈所有异常状态。

Name: Retaliate
Description (Short): Power doubles if an ally fainted last turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 为倒下的同伴报仇。如果上一回合有同伴倒下，威力翻倍。

Name: Return
Description (Short): Max 102 power at maximum Happiness.
Description (Chinese Short): 为了训练家而全力攻击对手。亲密度越高，威力越大。最大102。

Name: Revelation Dance
Description (Short): Type varies based on the user's primary type.
Description (Chinese Short): 全力跳舞进行攻击。此招式的属性将变得和自己的属性相同。

Name: Revenge
Description (Short): Power doubles if user is damaged by the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 如果本回合受到对手的招式攻击，就能给予对手２倍的伤害。

Name: Reversal
Description (Short): More power the less HP the user has left.
Description (Chinese Short): 竭尽全力进行攻击。自己的ＨＰ越少，招式的威力越大。

Name: Rising Voltage
Description (Short): 2x power if target is grounded in Electric Terrain.
Description (Chinese Short): 用从地面升腾而起的电击进行攻击。当对手处于电气场地上时，威力翻倍。

Name: Roar
Description (Short): Forces the target to switch to a random ally.
Description (Chinese Short): 放走对手，强制拉后备宝可梦上场。如果对手为野生宝可梦，战斗将直接结束。

Name: Roar of Time
Description (Short): User cannot move next turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 释放出扭曲时间般的强大力量攻击对手。下一回合自己将无法动弹。

Name: Rock Blast
Description (Short): Hits 2-5 times in one turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手发射坚硬的岩石进行攻击。连续攻击２～５次。

Name: Rock Climb
Description (Short): 20% chance to confuse the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用尽全力扑向对手进行攻击。20%几率使对手混乱。

Name: Rock Polish
Description (Short): Raises the user's Speed by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 打磨自己的身体，减少空气阻力。100%几率提高自己的速度2级。

Name: Rock Slide
Description (Short): 30% chance to flinch the foe(s).
Description (Chinese Short): 将大岩石猛烈地撞向对手进行攻击。30%几率使对手畏缩。

Name: Rock Smash
Description (Short): 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 用拳头进行攻击。50%几率降低对手的防御。

Name: Rock Throw
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 拿起小岩石，投掷对手进行攻击。

Name: Rock Tomb
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 投掷岩石进行攻击。封住对手的行动，100%几率降低目标速度1级。

Name: Rock Wrecker
Description (Short): User cannot move next turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手发射巨大的岩石进行攻击。下一回合自己将无法动弹。

Name: Role Play
Description (Short): User replaces its Ability with the target's.
Description (Chinese Short): 扮演对手，让自己的特性变得和对手相同。

Name: Rolling Kick
Description (Short): 30% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 一边使身体快速旋转，一边踢飞对手进行攻击。30%几率使对手畏缩。

Name: Rollout
Description (Short): Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内连续滚动攻击对手。招式每次击中，威力就会提高。

Name: Roost
Description (Short): Heals 50% HP. Flying-type removed 'til turn ends.
Description (Chinese Short): 降到地面，使身体休息。回复自己最大ＨＰ的一半。

Name: Rototiller
Description (Short): Raises Atk/Sp. Atk of grounded Grass types by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 翻耕土地，使草木更容易成长。100%几率提高地面上的草属性宝可梦的攻击和特攻各1级。

Name: Round
Description (Short): Power doubles if others used Round this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 用歌声攻击对手。同伴还可以接着使出轮唱招式，威力也会提高。

Name: Sacred Fire
Description (Short): 50% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.
Description (Chinese Short): 用神秘的火焰烧尽对手进行攻击。50%几率让对手陷入灼伤状态。

Name: Sacred Sword
Description (Short): Ignores the target's stat stage changes.
Description (Chinese Short): 用长角切斩对手进行攻击。无视对手的能力变化，直接给予伤害。

Name: Safeguard
Description (Short): For 5 turns, protects user's party from status.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内被神奇的力量守护，从而不会陷入异常状态。

Name: Sand Attack
Description (Short): Lowers the target's accuracy by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手脸上泼沙子，从而降低目标命中率1级。

Name: Sandstorm
Description (Short): For 5 turns, a sandstorm rages.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内扬起沙暴，除岩石、地面和钢属性以外的宝可梦，都会受到伤害。岩石属性的特防还会提高。

Name: Sand Tomb
Description (Short): Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 将对手困在铺天盖地的沙暴中，在４～５回合内进行攻击。

Name: Sappy Seed
Description (Short): Summons Leech Seed.
Description (Chinese Short): 长出巨大的藤蔓，播撒种子进行攻击。100%几率使目标进入寄生种子状态。

Name: Savage Spin-Out
Description (Short): Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量将吐出的丝线全力束缚对手。威力会根据原来的招式而改变。

Name: Scald
Description (Short): 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手喷射煮得翻滚的开水进行攻击。30%几率让对手陷入灼伤状态。

Name: Scale Shot
Description (Short): Hits 2-5 times. User: -1 Def, +1 Spe after last hit.
Description (Chinese Short): 发射鳞片进行攻击。连续攻击２～５次。攻击结束后令使用者防御降低1级，同时速度提升1级。

Name: Scary Face
Description (Short): Lowers the target's Speed by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 用恐怖的脸瞪着对手，使其害怕，从而降低对手的速度2级。

Name: Scorching Sands
Description (Short): 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.
Description (Chinese Short): 将滚烫的沙子砸向对手进行攻击。30%几率会让对手陷入灼伤状态。

Name: Scratch
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 用坚硬且无比锋利的爪子抓对手进行攻击。

Name: Screech
Description (Short): Lowers the target's Defense by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 发出不由自主想要捂起耳朵的刺耳声，从而低对手的防御2级。

Name: Searing Shot
Description (Short): 30% chance to burn adjacent Pokemon.
Description (Chinese Short): 用熊熊烈火攻击自己周围所有的宝可梦。30%几率使目标陷入灼伤状态。

Name: Searing Sunraze Smash
Description (Short): Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.
Description (Chinese Short): 得到Ｚ力量的索尔迦雷欧将全力进行攻击。可以无视对手的特性效果。

Name: Secret Power
Description (Short): Effect varies with terrain. (30% paralysis chance)
Description (Chinese Short): 根据使用场所不同，该招式的追加效果也会有所变化。追加效果几率为30%。

Name: Secret Sword
Description (Short): Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.
Description (Chinese Short): 用长角切斩对手进行攻击。角上拥有的神奇力量将给予物理伤害。使目标防御代替特防进行伤害计算。

Name: Seed Bomb
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 将外壳坚硬的大种子，从上方砸下攻击对手。

Name: Seed Flare
Description (Short): 40% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 从身体里产生冲击波。40%几率降低对手的特防2级。

Name: Seismic Toss
Description (Short): Does damage equal to the user's level.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用引力将对手甩飞出去。给予对手和自己等级相同的伤害。

Name: Self-Destruct
Description (Short): Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.
Description (Chinese Short): 引发爆炸，攻击自己周围所有的宝可梦。使用后陷入濒死。

Name: Shadow Ball
Description (Short): 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 投掷一团黑影进行攻击。20%几率降低对手的特防1级。

Name: Shadow Bone
Description (Short): 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 用附有灵魂的骨头殴打对手进行攻击。20%几率降低对手的防御1级。

Name: Shadow Claw
Description (Short): High critical hit ratio.
Description (Chinese Short): 以影子做成的锐爪，劈开对手。容易击中要害。

Name: Shadow Force
Description (Short): Disappears turn 1. Hits turn 2. Breaks protection.
Description (Chinese Short): 第１回合消失踪影，第２回合攻击对手。即使对手正受保护，也能击中。

Name: Shadow Punch
Description (Short): This move does not check accuracy.
Description (Chinese Short): 使出混影之拳。攻击必定会命中。

Name: Shadow Sneak
Description (Short): Usually goes first.
Description (Chinese Short): 伸长影子，从对手的背后进行攻击。必定能够先制攻击。

Name: Shadow Strike
Description (Short): 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 50%几率降低目标防御1级。

Name: Sharpen
Description (Short): Raises the user's Attack by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 增加身体的角，变得棱棱角角，从而提高自己的攻击1级。

Name: Shattered Psyche
Description (Short): Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量操纵对手，全力使其感受到痛苦。威力会根据原来的招式而改变。

Name: Sheer Cold
Description (Short): OHKOs non-Ice targets. Fails if user's lower level.
Description (Chinese Short): 给对手一击濒死。如果是冰属性以外的宝可梦使用，就会难以打中。

Name: Shell Side Arm
Description (Short): 20% psn. Physical+contact if it would be stronger.
Description (Chinese Short): 从物理攻击和特殊攻击中选择可造成较多伤害的方式进行攻击。20%几率让对手陷入中毒状态。

Name: Shell Smash
Description (Short): Lowers Def, SpD by 1; raises Atk, SpA, Spe by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 打破外壳，降低自己的防御和特防各1级，同时提高攻击、特攻和速度各2级。

Name: Shell Trap
Description (Short): User must take physical damage before moving.
Description (Chinese Short): 回合开始时，设下陷阱，若该回合中受到来自对手的物理攻击， 可引起爆炸并给予对手重大的伤害。

Name: Shift Gear
Description (Short): Raises the user's Speed by 2 and Attack by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 转动齿轮，不仅提高自己的攻击，还会大幅提高速度。

Name: Shock Wave
Description (Short): This move does not check accuracy.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手快速发出电击。攻击必定会命中。

Name: Shore Up
Description (Short): User restores 1/2 its max HP; 2/3 in Sandstorm.
Description (Chinese Short): 回复自己最大ＨＰ的一半。在沙暴中回复得更多。

Name: Signal Beam
Description (Short): 10% chance to confuse the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 发射神奇的光线进行攻击。10%几率使对手混乱。

Name: Silver Wind
Description (Short): 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).
Description (Chinese Short): 在风中掺入鳞粉攻击对手。10%几率提高自己的全部能力。

Name: Simple Beam
Description (Short): The target's Ability becomes Simple.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手发送谜之念波。接收到念波的对手，其特性会变为单纯。

Name: Sing
Description (Short): Causes the target to fall asleep.
Description (Chinese Short): 让对手听舒适、美妙的歌声，从而陷入睡眠状态。

Name: Sinister Arrow Raid
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量制造出无数箭的狙射树枭将全力射穿对手进行攻击。

Name: Sizzly Slide
Description (Short): 100% chance to burn the foe.
Description (Chinese Short): 用燃起大火的身体猛烈地冲撞对手。100%几率让对手陷入灼伤状态。

Name: Sketch
Description (Short): Permanently copies the last move target used.
Description (Chinese Short): 将对手使用的招式变成自己的招式。使用１次后写生消失。

Name: Skill Swap
Description (Short): The user and the target trade Abilities.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用超能力互换自己和对手的特性。

Name: Skitter Smack
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower target's Sp. Atk by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 从对手背后爬近后进行攻击。100%几率降低对手的特攻。

Name: Skull Bash
Description (Short): Raises user's Defense by 1 on turn 1. Hits turn 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 第１回合把头缩进去，从而提高防御1级。第２回合攻击对手。

Name: Sky Attack
Description (Short): Charges, then hits turn 2. 30% flinch. High crit.
Description (Chinese Short): 第２回合攻击对手。30%几率使对手畏缩。也容易击中要害。

Name: Sky Drop
Description (Short): User and foe fly up turn 1. Damages on turn 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 第１回合将对手带到空中，第２回合将其摔下进行攻击。被带到空中的对手不能动弹。

Name: Sky Uppercut
Description (Short): Can hit Pokemon using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop.
Description (Chinese Short): 用冲向天空般高高的上勾拳顶起对手进行攻击。

Name: Slack Off
Description (Short): Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 偷懒休息。回复自己最大ＨＰ的一半。

Name: Slam
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 使用长长的尾巴或藤蔓等摔打对手进行攻击。

Name: Slash
Description (Short): High critical hit ratio.
Description (Chinese Short): 用爪子或镰刀等劈开对手进行攻击。容易击中要害。

Name: Sleep Powder
Description (Short): Causes the target to fall asleep.
Description (Chinese Short): 撒出催眠粉，命中后100%几率让对手陷入睡眠状态。

Name: Sleep Talk
Description (Short): User must be asleep. Uses another known move.
Description (Chinese Short): 从自己已学会的招式中任意使出１个。只能在自己睡觉时使用。

Name: Sludge
Description (Short): 30% chance to poison the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用污泥投掷对手进行攻击。30%几率让对手陷入中毒状态。

Name: Sludge Bomb
Description (Short): 30% chance to poison the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用污泥投掷对手进行攻击。30%几率让对手陷入中毒状态。

Name: Sludge Wave
Description (Short): 10% chance to poison adjacent Pokemon.
Description (Chinese Short): 用污泥波攻击自己周围所有的宝可梦。10%几率使目标陷入中毒状态。

Name: Smack Down
Description (Short): Removes the target's Ground immunity.
Description (Chinese Short): 扔石头或炮弹，攻击飞行的对手。对手会被击落，掉到地面。

Name: Smart Strike
Description (Short): This move does not check accuracy.
Description (Chinese Short): 用尖尖的角刺入对手进行攻击。攻击必定会命中。

Name: Smelling Salts
Description (Short): Power doubles if target is paralyzed, and cures it.
Description (Chinese Short): 对于麻痹状态下的对手，威力会变成２倍。但对手的麻痹也会被治愈。

Name: Smog
Description (Short): 40% chance to poison the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 将肮脏的浓雾吹向对手进行攻击。40%几率让对手陷入中毒状态。

Name: Smokescreen
Description (Short): Lowers the target's accuracy by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手喷出烟或墨汁等，从而降低对手的命中率1级。

Name: Snap Trap
Description (Short): Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 使用捕兽夹，在４～５回合内，夹住对手进行攻击。

Name: Snarl
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Sp. Atk by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 没完没了地大声斥责，从而降低对手的特攻1级。

Name: Snatch
Description (Short): User steals certain support moves to use itself.
Description (Chinese Short): 将对手打算使用的回复招式或能力变化招式夺为己用。

Name: Snipe Shot
Description (Short): High critical hit ratio. Cannot be redirected.
Description (Chinese Short): 能无视具有吸引对手招式效果的特性或招式的影响。可以向选定的对手进行攻击。

Name: Snore
Description (Short): User must be asleep. 30% chance to flinch target.
Description (Chinese Short): 在自己睡觉时，发出噪音进行攻击。30%几率使对手畏缩。

Name: Soak
Description (Short): Changes the target's type to Water.
Description (Chinese Short): 将大量的水泼向对手，从而使其变成水属性。

Name: Soft-Boiled
Description (Short): Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 回复自己最大ＨＰ的一半。

Name: Solar Beam
Description (Short): Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.
Description (Chinese Short): 第１回合收集满满的日光，第２回合发射光束进行攻击。

Name: Solar Blade
Description (Short): Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.
Description (Chinese Short): 在第１回合储存日光的能量，然后在第２回合使出高威力攻击。

Name: Sonic Boom
Description (Short): Always does 20 HP of damage.
Description (Chinese Short): 将冲击波撞向对手进行攻击。必定会给予２０的伤害。

Name: Soul-Stealing 7-Star Strike
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 得到Ｚ力量的玛夏多将全力使出拳头和脚踢的连续招式叩打对手。必定会命中。

Name: Spacial Rend
Description (Short): High critical hit ratio.
Description (Chinese Short): 将对手连同周围的空间一起撕裂并给予伤害。容易击中要害。

Name: Spark
Description (Short): 30% chance to paralyze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 让电流覆盖全身，猛撞向对手进行攻击。30%几率让对手陷入麻痹状态。

Name: Sparkling Aria
Description (Short): The target is cured of its burn.
Description (Chinese Short): 受到这招式攻击的对手身上的灼伤状态将会痊愈。

Name: Sparkly Swirl
Description (Short): Cures the user's party of all status conditions.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用芬芳刺鼻的龙卷风吞噬对方。能治愈我方宝可梦的异常状态。

Name: Spectral Thief
Description (Short): Steals target's boosts before dealing damage.
Description (Chinese Short): 潜入对手的影子进行攻击。会先夺取对手的能力提升后再造成伤害。

Name: Speed Swap
Description (Short): Swaps Speed stat with target.
Description (Chinese Short): 将对手和自己的速度进行互换。

Name: Spider Web
Description (Short): Prevents the target from switching out.
Description (Chinese Short): 将黏糊糊的细丝一层一层缠住对手，使其不能从战斗中逃走。

Name: Spike Cannon
Description (Short): Hits 2-5 times in one turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手发射锐针进行攻击。连续攻击２～５次。

Name: Spikes
Description (Short): Hurts grounded foes on switch-in. Max 3 layers.
Description (Chinese Short): 在对手的脚下扔撒菱。对替换出场的对手的宝可梦给予满HP的1/8的伤害。

Name: Spiky Shield
Description (Short): Protects from moves. Contact: loses 1/8 max HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 防住对手攻击的同时，削减攻击方最大HP的1/8的HP。

Name: Spirit Break
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 用足以让对手一蹶不振的气势进行攻击。100%几率降低对手的特攻1级。

Name: Spirit Shackle
Description (Short): Prevents the target from switching out.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击的同时，缝住对手的影子，使其无法逃走。

Name: Spit Up
Description (Short): More power with more uses of Stockpile.
Description (Chinese Short): 将积蓄的力量撞向对手进行攻击。积蓄得越多，威力越大。

Name: Spite
Description (Short): Lowers the PP of the target's last move by 4.
Description (Chinese Short): 对对手最后使用的招式怀有怨恨，减少该招式4PP。

Name: Splash
Description (Short): No competitive use.
Description (Chinese Short): 也不攻击只是一蹦一蹦地跳，什么都不会发生……

Name: Splintered Stormshards
Description (Short): Ends the effects of terrain.
Description (Chinese Short): 得到Ｚ力量的鬃岩狼人将全力进行攻击。而且会消除场地状态。

Name: Splishy Splash
Description (Short): 30% chance to paralyze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 往巨浪中注入电能后冲撞对手进行攻击。30%几率让对手陷入麻痹状态。

Name: Spore
Description (Short): Causes the target to fall asleep.
Description (Chinese Short): 沙沙沙地撒满具有催眠效果的孢子，从而让对手陷入睡眠状态。

Name: Spotlight
Description (Short): Target's foes' moves are redirected to it this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 给宝可梦打上聚光灯，该回合只能瞄准该宝可梦。

Name: Stealth Rock
Description (Short): Hurts foes on switch-in. Factors Rock weakness.
Description (Chinese Short): 将无数岩石悬浮在对手的周围，从而对替换出场的对手的宝可梦给予满HP的1/8的伤害。

Name: Steam Eruption
Description (Short): 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.
Description (Chinese Short): 将滚烫的蒸汽喷向对手。30%几率让对手灼伤。

Name: Steamroller
Description (Short): 30% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 旋转揉成团的身体压扁对手。30%几率使对手畏缩。

Name: Steel Beam
Description (Short): User loses 50% max HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 将从全身聚集的钢铁化为光束，激烈地发射出去。自己会减少最大HP的一半。

Name: Steel Roller
Description (Short): Fails if there is no terrain active. Ends the terrain.
Description (Chinese Short): 在破坏场地的同时攻击对手。如果脚下没有任何场地状态存在，使出此招式时便会失败。

Name: Steel Wing
Description (Short): 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 用坚硬的翅膀敲打对手进行攻击。10%几率提高自己的防御1级。

Name: Sticky Web
Description (Short): Lowers Speed of grounded foes by 1 on switch-in.
Description (Chinese Short): 在对手周围围上黏黏的网，100%几率降低替换出场的对手的速度1级。

Name: Stockpile
Description (Short): Raises user's Defense, Sp. Def by 1. Max 3 uses.
Description (Chinese Short): 积蓄力量，提高自己的防御和特防各1级。最多积蓄３次。

Name: Stoked Sparksurfer
Description (Short): 100% chance to paralyze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 得到Ｚ力量的阿罗拉地区的雷丘将全力进行攻击。100%几率让对手陷入麻痹状态。一定会命中。

Name: Stomp
Description (Short): 30% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用大脚踩踏对手进行攻击。30%几率使对手畏缩。

Name: Stomping Tantrum
Description (Short): Power doubles if the user's last move failed.
Description (Chinese Short): 化悔恨为力量进行攻击。如果上一回合招式没有打中，威力就会翻倍。

Name: Stone Edge
Description (Short): High critical hit ratio.
Description (Chinese Short): 用尖尖的岩石刺入对手进行攻击。容易击中要害。

Name: Stored Power
Description (Short): + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.
Description (Chinese Short): 用蓄积起来的力量攻击对手。自己的能力提高得越多，威力就越大。

Name: Storm Throw
Description (Short): Always results in a critical hit.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手使出强烈的一击。攻击必定会击中要害。

Name: Strange Steam
Description (Short): 20% chance to confuse the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 喷出烟雾攻击对手。20%几率使对手混乱。

Name: Strength
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 使出浑身力气殴打对手进行攻击。

Name: Strength Sap
Description (Short): User heals HP=target's Atk stat. Lowers Atk by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 给自己回复和对手攻击力相同数值的ＨＰ，然后降低对手的攻击1级。

Name: String Shot
Description (Short): Lowers the foe(s) Speed by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 用口中吐出的丝缠绕对手，从而低对手的速度2级。

Name: Struggle
Description (Short): User loses 1/4 of its max HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 当自己的ＰＰ耗尽时，努力挣扎攻击对手。自己也会损失最大HP的1/4。

Name: Struggle Bug
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Sp. Atk by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 抵抗并攻击对手。100%几率降低对手的特攻1级。

Name: Stuff Cheeks
Description (Short): Must hold Berry to use. User eats Berry, Def +2.
Description (Chinese Short): 吃掉携带的树果，并提高自身防御2级。

Name: Stun Spore
Description (Short): Paralyzes the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 撒出麻痹粉，从而让对手陷入麻痹状态。

Name: Submission
Description (Short): Has 1/4 recoil.
Description (Chinese Short): 将对手连同自己一起摔向地面进行攻击。自己也会受到1/4的伤害。

Name: Substitute
Description (Short): User takes 1/4 its max HP to put in a substitute.
Description (Chinese Short): 削减自己最大HP的1/4，制造分身。分身将成为自己的替身。

Name: Subzero Slammer
Description (Short): Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量急剧降低气温，全力冰冻对手。威力会根据原来的招式而改变。

Name: Sucker Punch
Description (Short): Usually goes first. Fails if target is not attacking.
Description (Chinese Short): 可以比对手先攻击。对手使出的招式如果不是攻击招式则会失败。

Name: Sunny Day
Description (Short): For 5 turns, intense sunlight powers Fire moves.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内阳光变得强烈，从而提高火属性的招式威力。水属性的招式威力则降低。

Name: Sunsteel Strike
Description (Short): Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.
Description (Chinese Short): 以流星般的气势猛撞对手，可无视对手的特性并进行攻击。

Name: Super Fang
Description (Short): Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 用锋利的门牙猛烈地咬住对手进行攻击。对手的ＨＰ减半。

Name: Superpower
Description (Short): Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 发挥惊人的力量攻击对手。自己的攻击和防御都会降低1级。

Name: Supersonic
Description (Short): Causes the target to become confused.
Description (Chinese Short): 从身体发出特殊的音波，从而使对手混乱。

Name: Supersonic Skystrike
Description (Short): Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量猛烈地飞向天空，朝对手全力落下。威力会根据原来的招式而改变。

Name: Surf
Description (Short): Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dive.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用大浪攻击自己周围所有的宝可梦。

Name: Surging Strikes
Description (Short): Always results in a critical hit. Hits 3 times.
Description (Chinese Short): 将水之流派修炼至大成的仿若行云流水般的３次连击。必定会击中要害。

Name: Swagger
Description (Short): Raises the target's Attack by 2 and confuses it.
Description (Chinese Short): 激怒对手，使其混乱。因为愤怒，对手的攻击会提高2级。

Name: Swallow
Description (Short): Heals the user based on uses of Stockpile.
Description (Chinese Short): 将积蓄的力量吞下，从而回复自己的ＨＰ。积蓄得越多，回复越大。

Name: Sweet Kiss
Description (Short): Causes the target to become confused.
Description (Chinese Short): 像天使般可爱地亲吻对手，从而使对手混乱。

Name: Sweet Scent
Description (Short): Lowers the foe(s) evasiveness by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 用香气降低对手的闪避率2级。

Name: Swift
Description (Short): This move does not check accuracy. Hits foes.
Description (Chinese Short): 发射星形的光攻击对手。攻击必定会命中。

Name: Switcheroo
Description (Short): User switches its held item with the target's.
Description (Chinese Short): 用一闪而过的速度交换自己和对手的持有物。

Name: Swords Dance
Description (Short): Raises the user's Attack by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 激烈地跳起战舞提高气势。提高自己的攻击2级。

Name: Synchronoise
Description (Short): Hits adjacent Pokemon sharing the user's type.
Description (Chinese Short): 用神奇电波对周围所有和自己属性相同的宝可梦给予伤害。

Name: Synthesis
Description (Short): Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.
Description (Chinese Short): 回复自己的ＨＰ。根据天气的不同，回复量也会有所变化。

Name: Tackle
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 用整个身体撞向对手进行攻击。

Name: Tail Glow
Description (Short): Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 3.
Description (Chinese Short): 凝视闪烁的光芒，集中自己的精神，从而提高特攻3级。

Name: Tail Slap
Description (Short): Hits 2-5 times in one turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 用坚硬的尾巴拍打对手进行攻击。连续攻击２～５次。

Name: Tail Whip
Description (Short): Lowers the foe(s) Defense by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 可爱地左右摇晃尾巴，诱使对手疏忽大意。100%几率降低对手的防御1级。

Name: Tailwind
Description (Short): For 4 turns, allies' Speed is doubled.
Description (Chinese Short): 刮起猛烈的旋风，在４回合内提高我方全员的速度。

Name: Take Down
Description (Short): Has 1/4 recoil.
Description (Chinese Short): 以惊人的气势撞向对手进行攻击。自己也会受到1/4的伤害。

Name: Tar Shot
Description (Short): Target gets -1 Spe and becomes weaker to Fire.
Description (Chinese Short): 泼洒黏糊糊的沥青，降低对手的速度1级，并且使对手的弱点变为火。

Name: Taunt
Description (Short): Target can't use status moves its next 3 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 使对手愤怒。在３回合内让对手只能使出给予伤害的招式。

Name: Tearful Look
Description (Short): Lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 变得泪眼汪汪，让对手丧失斗志。从而降低对手的攻击和特攻各1级。

Name: Teatime
Description (Short): All active Pokemon consume held Berries.
Description (Chinese Short): 举办一场茶会，场上的所有宝可梦都会吃掉自己携带的树果。

Name: Techno Blast
Description (Short): Type varies based on the held Drive.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手放出光弹。属性会根据自己携带的卡带不同而改变。

Name: Tectonic Rage
Description (Short): Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量潜入地里最深处，全力撞上对手。威力会根据原来的招式而改变。

Name: Teeter Dance
Description (Short): Confuses adjacent Pokemon.
Description (Chinese Short): 摇摇晃晃地跳起舞蹈，让自己周围的宝可梦陷入混乱状态。

Name: Telekinesis
Description (Short): For 3 turns, target floats but moves can't miss it.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用超能力使对手浮起来。在３回合内攻击会变得容易打中对手。

Name: Teleport
Description (Short): User switches out.
Description (Chinese Short): 停止和野生宝可梦战斗并逃走。

Name: Terrain Pulse
Description (Short): User on terrain: power doubles, type varies.
Description (Chinese Short): 借助场地的力量进行攻击。视使出招式时场地状态不同，招式的属性和威力会有所变化。

Name: Thief
Description (Short): If the user has no item, it steals the target's.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击的同时盗取道具。当自己携带道具时，不会去盗取。

Name: Thousand Arrows
Description (Short): Grounds adjacent foes. First hit neutral on Flying.
Description (Chinese Short): 可以击中浮在空中的宝可梦。空中的对手被击落后，会掉到地面。

Name: Thousand Waves
Description (Short): Hits adjacent foes. Prevents them from switching.
Description (Chinese Short): 从地面掀起波浪进行攻击。被掀入波浪中的对手，将无法从战斗中逃走。

Name: Thrash
Description (Short): Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.
Description (Chinese Short): 在２～３回合内，乱打一气地攻击对手。大闹一番后自己会陷入混乱。

Name: Throat Chop
Description (Short): For 2 turns, the target cannot use sound moves.
Description (Chinese Short): 受到此招式攻击的对手，会因为地狱般的痛苦，在２回合内，变得无法使出声音类招式。

Name: Thunder
Description (Short): 30% chance to paralyze. Can't miss in rain.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手劈下暴雷进行攻击。30%几率让对手陷入麻痹状态。

Name: Thunderbolt
Description (Short): 10% chance to paralyze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手发出强力电击进行攻击。10%几率让对手陷入麻痹状态。

Name: Thunder Cage
Description (Short): Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 将对手困在电流四溅的囚笼中，在４～５回合内进行攻击。

Name: Thunder Fang
Description (Short): 10% chance to paralyze. 10% chance to flinch.
Description (Chinese Short): 用蓄满电流的牙齿咬住对手。10%几率使对手畏缩或陷入麻痹状态。

Name: Thunderous Kick
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 以雷电般的动作戏耍对手的同时使出脚踢。可降低对手的防御1级。

Name: Thunder Punch
Description (Short): 10% chance to paralyze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用充满电流的拳头攻击对手。10%几率让对手陷入麻痹状态。

Name: Thunder Shock
Description (Short): 10% chance to paralyze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 发出电流刺激对手进行攻击。10%几率让对手陷入麻痹状态。

Name: Thunder Wave
Description (Short): Paralyzes the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手发出微弱的电击，从而让对手陷入麻痹状态。

Name: Tickle
Description (Short): Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 给对手挠痒，使其发笑，从而降低对手的攻击和防御各1级。

Name: Topsy-Turvy
Description (Short): Inverts the target's stat stages.
Description (Chinese Short): 颠倒对手身上的所有能力变化，变成和原来相反的状态。

Name: Torment
Description (Short): Target can't select the same move twice in a row.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手无理取闹，令其不能连续２次使出相同招式。

Name: Toxic
Description (Short): Badly poisons the target. Poison types can't miss.
Description (Chinese Short): 让对手陷入剧毒状态。随着回合的推进，中毒伤害会增加。

Name: Toxic Spikes
Description (Short): Poisons grounded foes on switch-in. Max 2 layers.
Description (Chinese Short): 在对手的脚下撒毒菱。使对手替换出场的宝可梦中毒。

Name: Toxic Thread
Description (Short): Lowers the target's Speed by 1 and poisons it.
Description (Chinese Short): 将混有毒的丝吐向对手。使其中毒，并降低对手的速度1级。

Name: Transform
Description (Short): Copies target's stats, moves, types, and Ability.
Description (Chinese Short): 变身成对手宝可梦的样子，能够使用和对手完全相同的招式

Name: Tri Attack
Description (Short): 20% chance to paralyze or burn or freeze target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用３种光线进行攻击。有20%几率让对手陷入麻痹、灼伤或冰冻的状态。

Name: Trick
Description (Short): User switches its held item with the target's.
Description (Chinese Short): 抓住对手的空隙，交换自己和对手的持有物。

Name: Trick-or-Treat
Description (Short): Adds Ghost to the target's type(s).
Description (Chinese Short): 邀请对手参加万圣夜。使对手被追加幽灵属性。

Name: Trick Room
Description (Short): Goes last. For 5 turns, turn order is reversed.
Description (Chinese Short): 制造出离奇的空间。在５回合内速度慢的宝可梦可以先行动。

Name: Triple Axel
Description (Short): Hits 3 times. Each hit can miss, but power rises.
Description (Chinese Short): 连续３次踢对手进行攻击。每踢中一次，威力就会提高。

Name: Triple Kick
Description (Short): Hits 3 times. Each hit can miss, but power rises.
Description (Chinese Short): 连续３次踢对手进行攻击。每踢中一次，威力就会提高。

Name: Trop Kick
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手使出来自南国的火热脚踢。从而降低对手的攻击1级。

Name: Trump Card
Description (Short): More power the fewer PP this move has left.
Description (Chinese Short): 王牌招式的剩余ＰＰ越少，招式的威力越大。

Name: Twineedle
Description (Short): Hits 2 times. Each hit has 20% chance to poison.
Description (Chinese Short): 将２根针刺入对手，连续２次给予伤害。每次都有20%的几率让对手陷入中毒状态。

Name: Twinkle Tackle
Description (Short): Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量制造魅惑空间，全力捉弄对手。威力会根据原来的招式而改变。

Name: Twister
Description (Short): 20% chance to flinch the foe(s).
Description (Chinese Short): 兴起龙卷风，将对手卷入进行攻击。20%几率使对手畏缩。

Name: U-turn
Description (Short): User switches out after damaging the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 在攻击之后急速返回，和后备宝可梦进行替换。

Name: Uproar
Description (Short): Lasts 3 turns. Active Pokemon cannot fall asleep.
Description (Chinese Short): 在３回合内用骚乱攻击对手。在此期间谁都不能入眠。

Name: Vacuum Wave
Description (Short): Usually goes first.
Description (Chinese Short): 挥动拳头，掀起真空波。必定能够先制攻击。

Name: V-create
Description (Short): Lowers the user's Defense, Sp. Def, Speed by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 从前额产生灼热的火焰，舍身撞击对手。令使用者防御、特防和速度各降低1级。

Name: Veevee Volley
Description (Short): Max happiness: 102 power. Can't miss.
Description (Chinese Short): 伊布越喜欢训练家，冲撞的威力就越强。攻击必定会命中。

Name: Venom Drench
Description (Short): Lowers Atk/Sp. Atk/Speed of poisoned foes by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 将特殊的毒液泼向对手。对处于中毒状态的对手，使其攻击、特攻和速度各降低1级。

Name: Venoshock
Description (Short): Power doubles if the target is poisoned.
Description (Chinese Short): 将特殊的毒液泼向对手。对处于中毒状态的对手，威力会变成２倍。

Name: Vine Whip
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 用如同鞭子般弯曲而细长的藤蔓摔打对手进行攻击。

Name: Vise Grip
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 将对手从两侧夹住，给予伤害。

Name: Vital Throw
Description (Short): This move does not check accuracy. Goes last.
Description (Chinese Short): 会在对手之后进行攻击。但是自己的攻击必定会命中。

Name: Volt Switch
Description (Short): User switches out after damaging the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 在攻击之后急速返回，和后备宝可梦进行替换。

Name: Volt Tackle
Description (Short): Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to paralyze target.
Description (Chinese Short): 让电流覆盖全身猛撞向对手。自己也会受到1/3的伤害。10%几率让对手陷入麻痹状态。

Name: Wake-Up Slap
Description (Short): Power doubles if target is asleep, and wakes it.
Description (Chinese Short): 给予睡眠状态下的对手较大的伤害。但相反对手会从睡眠中醒过来。

Name: Waterfall
Description (Short): 20% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 以惊人的气势扑向对手。20%几率使对手畏缩。

Name: Water Gun
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手猛烈地喷射水流进行攻击。

Name: Water Pledge
Description (Short): Use with Grass or Fire Pledge for added effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 用水柱进行攻击。如果和草之誓约或火之誓约组合，效果更佳。

Name: Water Pulse
Description (Short): 20% chance to confuse the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用水的震动攻击对手。20%几率使对手混乱。

Name: Water Shuriken
Description (Short): Usually goes first. Hits 2-5 times in one turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 用粘液制成的手里剑，连续攻击２～５次。必定能够先制攻击。

Name: Water Sport
Description (Short): For 5 turns, Fire-type attacks have 1/3 power.
Description (Chinese Short): 用水湿透周围。在５回合内减弱火属性的招式。

Name: Water Spout
Description (Short): Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).
Description (Chinese Short): 掀起潮水进行攻击。自己的ＨＰ越少，招式的威力越小。

Name: Weather Ball
Description (Short): Power doubles and type varies in each weather.
Description (Chinese Short): 根据使用时的天气，招式属性和威力会改变。

Name: Whirlpool
Description (Short): Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 将对手困在激烈的水流旋涡中，在４～５回合内进行攻击。

Name: Whirlwind
Description (Short): Forces the target to switch to a random ally.
Description (Chinese Short): 吹飞对手，强制拉后备宝可梦上场。如果对手为野生宝可梦，战斗将直接结束。

Name: Wicked Blow
Description (Short): Always results in a critical hit.
Description (Chinese Short): 将恶之流派修炼至大成的猛烈一击。必定会击中要害。

Name: Wide Guard
Description (Short): Protects allies from multi-target moves this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 在１回合内防住击打我方全员的攻击。

Name: Wild Charge
Description (Short): Has 1/4 recoil.
Description (Chinese Short): 让电流覆盖全身撞向对手进行攻击。自己也会受到1/4的伤害。

Name: Will-O-Wisp
Description (Short): Burns the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 放出怪异的火焰，从而让对手陷入灼伤状态。

Name: Wing Attack
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 大大地展开美丽的翅膀，将其撞向对手进行攻击。

Name: Wish
Description (Short): Next turn, 50% of the user's max HP is restored.
Description (Chinese Short): 在下一回合回复自己或是替换出场的宝可梦最大ＨＰ的一半。

Name: Withdraw
Description (Short): Raises the user's Defense by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 缩入壳里保护身体，从而提高自己的防御1级。

Name: Wonder Room
Description (Short): For 5 turns, all Defense and Sp. Def stats switch.
Description (Chinese Short): 制造出离奇的空间。在５回合内互换所有宝可梦的防御和特防。

Name: Wood Hammer
Description (Short): Has 33% recoil.
Description (Chinese Short): 用坚硬的躯体撞击对手进行攻击。自己也会受到1/3的伤害。

Name: Work Up
Description (Short): Raises the user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 激励自己，从而提高攻击和特攻各1级。

Name: Worry Seed
Description (Short): The target's Ability becomes Insomnia.
Description (Chinese Short): 种植心神不宁的种子。使对手不能入眠，并将特性变成不眠。

Name: Wrap
Description (Short): Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 使用长长的身体或藤蔓等，在４～５回合内紧束对手进行攻击。

Name: Wring Out
Description (Short): More power the more HP the target has left.
Description (Chinese Short): 用力勒紧对手进行攻击。对手的ＨＰ越多，威力越大。

Name: X-Scissor
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 将镰刀或爪子像剪刀般地交叉，顺势劈开对手。

Name: Yawn
Description (Short): Puts the target to sleep after 1 turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 打个大哈欠引起瞌睡。在下一回合让对手陷入睡眠状态。

Name: Zap Cannon
Description (Short): 100% chance to paralyze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 发射大炮一样的电流进行攻击。100%几率让对手陷入麻痹状态。

Name: Zen Headbutt
Description (Short): 20% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 将思念的力量集中在前额进行攻击。20%几率使对手畏缩。

Name: Zing Zap
Description (Short): 30% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 撞向对手，并发出强电，使其感到麻麻刺刺的。30%几率使对手畏缩。

Name: Zippy Zap
Description (Short): Goes first. Raises user's evasion by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 迅猛无比的电击。必定能够先制攻击，必定会击中对方的要害。
